content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 16), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"初期配置(7,16)。敵空母は右下(26,26)近傍。まずは敵推定海域へ向け索敵を最大化。空母は安全距離を保ちつつ東進し、航空2隊で扇形に広域索敵し先見を取る。launch半径22なので現位置からは(26,26)に届かないため、空母をやや前進しつつ、初手から届く東方中間点を指定して往路で発見を狙う。ASQ1は南東高め、ASQ2は東〜東南で扇形に分散。陸地帯は南東に点在するが目標は海上に設定。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":10,"y":16},"launch_target":{"x":22,"y":22}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=10 y=16 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=9 y=15.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking":"空母の移動先が陸地だったため修正。安全を保ちつつ東進し、発艦半径を伸ばす。初手は扇形索敵で敵推定エリア(26,26近傍)へ向け南東寄りにASQ1、東南〜中腹にASQ2を投入。空母は海上タイルへ移動継続。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":9,"y":15},"launch_target":{"x":22,"y":22}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (22, 22) while at (9, 15).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 15), en route to target (9, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (9, 15), outbound toward (22, 22), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"AC1は(8,15)→(9,15)へ移動中。敵は右下(26,26)近傍。ASQ1は(22,22)へ南東索敵中。扇形で重複を避け、ASQ2はやや東寄り(22,18)へ送り広域カバー。空母は安全圏を保ちつつさらに東へ前進して索敵半径を拡張するが、陸地を避けて海上を選択。次ターン以降(24,24)周辺まで届く態勢に。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":10,"y":15},"launch_target":{"x":22,"y":18}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (22, 18) while at (11, 15).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (10, 15), en route to target (10, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (13, 16), outbound toward (22, 22), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (11, 15), outbound toward (22, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"敵空母は(26,26)近傍想定。ASQ1は南東(22,22)へ、ASQ2は東南(22,18)へ順調に扇形索敵中。次は空母をさらに東進し発艦半径と回収位置を前進、敵に近づきすぎないよう海上経路を維持。敵発見時の即時追撃に備える。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":12,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (16, 20) while at (16, 18).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (16, 20) while at (15, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (16, 20) (previously at (17, 22)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (12, 15), en route to target (12, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (16, 18), outbound toward (22, 22), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (15, 15), outbound toward (22, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵機BSQ1を(16,20)で同時観測。敵空母はその発進半径内にあるはずで、BSQ1の進路は南西→西寄り。右下方面(26,26近傍)仮説は維持。ただしBSQ1の出所として(22-28,22-28)の海域が有力。こちらは先見優位を狙い、ASQ1は予定通り(22,22)へ、ASQ2は(22,18)へ向け走査を継続して敵空母の所在特定を急ぐ。空母は前進して回収線・再攻撃ラインを前に出すが、敵機接近の恐れがあるため海上で安全に東進。次ターン、敵空母位置を掴み次第、直撃コースに増速攻撃。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":14,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (14, 17) while at (18, 20).

- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (16, 20) while at (19, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (14, 16) while at (19, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (16, 20) while at (19, 16).

- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (14, 16) (previously at (17, 22)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (16, 20) (previously at (17, 23)), HP 40/40.

- Your squadron ASQ1: position (19, 20), outbound toward (22, 22), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (19, 16), outbound toward (22, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵機2隊(BSQ1:14,16 / BSQ2:16,20)を確認。敵空母はこれらの出所として右下方面(26,26近傍)仮説は依然有力。敵機は我の空母方面へ向かっている可能性が高く、早期に敵空母を特定して先制打撃を取る必要。ASQ1は(22,22)へ、ASQ2は(22,18)へ継続し扇形索敵で(22-26,18-26)帯を掃引。空母はさらに東進し、次ターン以降の再出撃・回収を前進配置。自艦への直撃コースを避けるため、陸地回避しつつ海域(16,15)へ。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

Recent events:

- Your squadron ASQ2: position (22, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母BC1を(18,26)で捕捉。ASQ1は自動で攻撃目標設定済みで突入中。ASQ2は帰還中だが、空母を前進させて回収・再武装・再出撃を早めたい。ただし自空母は被弾しており(75/100)、敵航空の接近(15,16付近)もあるため、敵空母へやや接近しつつも陸地を避ける海上経路で東進して回収ラインを前に出す。ASQ1の攻撃と同時にASQ2を早期に再出撃し、連続打撃で撃沈を狙う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"ASQ1が敵空母BC1(16,25)に取り付き。ASQ2は帰投中で、早期回収・再出撃で波状攻撃を狙う。自空母は被弾中(54/100)だが、ここで下がると決定打を逃す。東進して回収・再武装を前進させ、敵空母付近(16,25)への再攻撃半径を確保。敵機は(15-16,16-20)帯に残存、復路では攻撃されないためASQ1の帰還経路は安全。次のターンASQ2を着艦させ即再出撃方針。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵空母BC1を(16,25)で捕捉・被弾80/100。ASQ1は帰還中(21/40)。ASQ2は満載で即時出撃可能。今が第二撃の好機。敵機は(16,20〜24)帯に散在するが航空同士は交戦せず、攻撃目標は空母のみ。空母は東進して発艦/回収半径を維持しつつ過度接近は避ける。ASQ2で直ちに(16,25)へ攻撃。ASQ1は帰還継続→回収後、状況次第で三撃目。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":15},"launch_target":{"x":16,"y":25}}}
